metadata.description: Generate 3D human motions via text-to-generation interface of Hunyuan Motion!

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/hunyuan-motion/fast
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/hunyuan-motion/fast queue.

examples: A person is running then takes a big leap.
Someone waves hello with their right hand.
A dancer performs a spinning pirouette.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt describing the motion to generate.

guidance_scale.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Higher = more faithful to prompt.
guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.description: Output format: 'fbx' for animation files, 'dict' for raw JSON.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Turn simple sketches into detailed, fully-textured 3D models. Instantly convert your concept designs into formats ready for Unity, Unreal, and Blender.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/hunyuan3d-v3/text-to-3d
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/hunyuan3d-v3/text-to-3d queue.

enable_pbr.title: Enable Pbr
enable_pbr.description: Whether to enable PBR material generation

polygon_type.title: Polygon Type
polygon_type.description: Polygon type. Only takes effect when GenerateType is LowPoly.

examples: A rustic wooden treasure chest with metal bands and ornate lock
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text description of the 3D content to generate. Supports up to 1024 UTF-8 characters.

generate_type.title: Generate Type
generate_type.description: Generation type. Normal: textured model. LowPoly: polygon reduction. Geometry: white model without texture.

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: Preview thumbnail of the generated model

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Meshy-6-Preview is the latest model from Meshy. It generates realistic and production ready 3D models.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/meshy/v6-preview/text-to-3d
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/meshy/v6-preview/text-to-3d queue.

examples: A rustic, antique wooden treasure chest with a curved, domed lid, constructed from weathered, dark brown planks exhibiting prominent wood grain and subtle distress. It's heavily reinforced with broad, dark grey, oxidized metal bands secured by numerous circular rivets. Ornate, dark iron decorative elements featuring swirling foliate patterns and dragon motifs adorn the corners and lid. A prominent, circular, intricately carved metal lock plate with a central keyhole dominates the front, flanked by two large, dark metallic pull rings.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Describe what kind of object the 3D model is. Maximum 600 characters.

enable_pbr.description: Generate PBR Maps (metallic, roughness, normal) in addition to base color. Should be false for sculpture style.
enable_pbr.title: Enable Pbr

target_polycount.title: Target Polycount
target_polycount.description: Target number of polygons in the generated model

art_style.description: Desired art style of the object. Note: enable_pbr should be false for sculpture style.
art_style.title: Art Style

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, input data will be checked for safety before processing.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

mode.description: Generation mode. 'preview' returns untextured geometry only, 'full' returns textured model (preview + refine).
mode.title: Mode

symmetry_mode.description: Controls symmetry behavior during model generation.
symmetry_mode.title: Symmetry Mode

should_remesh.description: Whether to enable the remesh phase. When false, returns unprocessed triangular mesh.
should_remesh.title: Should Remesh

texture_image_url.description: 2D image to guide the texturing process (only used in 'full' mode)
texture_image_url.title: Texture Image Url

topology.description: Specify the topology of the generated model. Quad for smooth surfaces, Triangle for detailed geometry.
topology.title: Topology

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Whether to enable prompt expansion. This will use a large language model to expand the prompt with additional details while maintaining the original meaning.
enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion

seed.description: Seed for reproducible results. Same prompt and seed usually generate the same result.
seed.title: Seed

is_a_t_pose.description: Whether to generate the model in an A/T pose
is_a_t_pose.title: Is A T Pose

texture_prompt.description: Additional text prompt to guide the texturing process (only used in 'full' mode)
texture_prompt.title: Texture Prompt

examples: A rustic, antique wooden treasure chest with a curved, domed lid, constructed from weathered, dark brown planks exhibiting prominent wood grain and subtle distress. It's heavily reinforced with broad, dark grey, oxidized metal bands secured by numerous circular rivets. Ornate, dark iron decorative elements featuring swirling foliate patterns and dragon motifs adorn the corners and lid. A prominent, circular, intricately carved metal lock plate with a central keyhole dominates the front, flanked by two large, dark metallic pull rings.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The text prompt used for generation

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: Preview thumbnail of the generated model

actual_prompt.description: The actual prompt used if prompt expansion was enabled
actual_prompt.title: Actual Prompt

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

TextureFiles.title: TextureFiles
TextureFiles.description: Texture files downloaded and uploaded to CDN

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
